name: NotificationQueue.NotificationCoalescing
desc: The constants that specify how notifications are coalesced.

items.name: static var none: NotificationQueue.NotificationCoalescing
items.desc: Do not coalesce notifications in the queue.

items.name: static var onName: NotificationQueue.NotificationCoalescing
items.desc: Coalesce notifications with the same name.

items.name: static var onSender: NotificationQueue.NotificationCoalescing
items.desc: Coalesce notifications with the same object.
